name: BLEAK: Welcome to Glimmer
description: A super high difficulty, fantastical 2D action platformer complete with an expansive original soundtrack. 20+ Levels. Multiple playable characters. Rich lore. BLEAK: Welcome to Glimmer is Act One in a timeless tale of loss and redemption.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 - 2.2GHz or beyond Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 240 / Radeon HD 657 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: The BEST purchase I've made on steam. The game is super hard but the concept is super simple which makes it an incredibly addicting game. The music is FANTASTIC!!! I am getting the DLC of the sound track because it's so good! The graphics are decent but the gameplay and music make up for it. The world is huge with tons to explore. I can't wait to beat the game. For 8$? What else would you want! 10/10

Bleak is 10/10 a great game for people who want to be challenged, have competitions between friends or even if you're just looking for a time killer that'll pass time fast with the amount of enjoyment and challenge that comes with Bleak. I would HIGHLY suggest anyone who hasn't already bought it shouldn't look any further for something new to play.
